pullRequest.title: Fix API docs in task module
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose

$title


Note: Since the Scheduler and the Listener both can behave as a timer or an appointment, it is difficult to add single line code snippets for function descriptors without confusion. Therefore linked the ballerina by example links.

Check List

 Read the Contributing Guide
 Updated Change Log
 Checked Tooling Support (#)
 Added necessary tests

 Unit Tests
 Spec Conformance Tests
 Integration Tests
 Ballerina By Example Tests


 Increased Test Coverage
 Added necessary documentation

 API documentation
 Module documentation in Module.md files
 Ballerina By Examples
